resources.string: \t\tThe BEEMO-Development of Automated Beehive Monitoring System is a device that will be able to monitor the health status of the bees, through monitoring the inside and outside temperature and relative humidity of the hive, plus the weight which depends on the beehive. In addition, the BEEMO can be used for the research on stingless bees to determine the absolute value of temperature, humidity and weight using the sensors located on the device. It also allows the beekeepers/users to remotely monitor honey accumulation in the beehives by determining the weight produced by the bees. The data from the hives reaches phone application through the cellular and internet networks. A SMS alert will also serve as notification whenever the user is not connected on the internet. The data on the graph collected from the system enables the beekeepers to understand precisely what is happening on the hive and bees. With the information receive from the system, beekeepers can react instantly and accurately making optimal decision for the hives.
